item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Use Firefox in 2025 (10 points | 8 comments)
2. Apple's Software Quality Crisis: When Premium Hardware Meets Subpar Software (75 points | 77 comments)
3. VT220 font emulation in browser (15 points | 3 comments)
4. Why Can’t We Screenshot Frames From DRM-Protected Video on Apple Devices? (28 points | 12 comments)
5. Some things that make Rust lifetimes hard to learn (17 points | 9 comments)
6. How fast can you open 1000 files? (17 points | 7 comments)
7. The power of interning: making a time series database 2000x smaller in Rust (10 points | 1 comment)
8. Tangled — a git collaboration platform built on atproto (52 points | 18 comments)
9. The Fibrovisor: Turning a dollar store fibre optic wand into a low resolution display (8 points | no comments)
10. illuminant - ActivityPub server with NNTP interface (29 points | 6 comments)
11. HATETRIS - Obsession, Friendship, and World Records (11 points | 2 comments)
12. globstar — open-source static analysis toolkit for writing code checkers in YAML and GO (3 points | no comments)
13. The Empty Promise of AI-Generated Creativity (11 points | 8 comments)
14. See yourself, at runtime (11 points | no comments)
15. A float walks into a gradual type system (11 points | 5 comments)
16. When declarative systems break (3 points | 1 comment)
17. polars’ Rgonomic Patterns (6 points | 1 comment)
18. Yoke is really cool (33 points | 24 comments)
19. Begrudgingly choosing CBOR over MessagePack (34 points | 33 comments)
20. You Need Much Less Memory than Time (2 points | 1 comment)
21. Do not run any Cargo commands on untrusted projects (1 points | 3 comments)
22. What are you doing this week? (5 points | 12 comments)
23. Hacking the Xbox 360 Hypervisor Part 2: The Bad Update Exploit (4 points | no comments)
24. Cleaner codebase, happier mind (15 points | 8 comments)
25. The Botfly Test: Characterizing parasitic automated behavior in online communities (3 points | no comments)
